Title: Relates to the time period during which absentee ballots shall be mailed or delivered after an application for such ballot is received by the board of elections
Summary: Relates to the time period during which absentee ballots shall be mailed or delivered after an application for such ballot is received by the board of elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the time period during which absentee ballots shall be mailed or delivered after an application for such ballot is received by the board of elections
